mainHero.title: Invest and Grow
mainHero.subtitle: with AI
mainHero.description: Your Smart Companion for Daily Investments. we believe in breaking down barriers to investing. With our unique approach, even individuals from Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities, daily wage earners, and small business owners can confidently participate in the stock market with small yet impactful and consistent investments.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:infinitywaveaisolutions@gmail.com?subject=I like know more about daily invest AI!

items.title: Consistency!
items.description: Capture market movements daily, reducing the impact of volatility. Benefit from AI-driven insights and analysis to make better investment decisions.

items.title: Affordability!
items.description: Make small investments over time instead of requiring a large upfront amount. Multi-lingual app gives you accurate information in your own language.

features.title: Advance AI Technology
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: Frontend with React.js and Next.js for fast, SEO-friendly user interfaces. Backend with Node.js and Python for robust data processing. AI Algorithms, NLP for multilingual support, Machine Learning for stock trend analysis and strategic recommendations. APIs: Integration with market data providers (e.g., Alpha Vantage, Yahoo Finance). Database: Chroma DB for semantic relational dependencies.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Open AI
items.description: Open AI is advance most efficient AI models

items.name: Python
items.description: Python project making it so quick and fast.

items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
